root.name: F-15 Strike Eagle III
root.description: F-15 Strike Eagle III is a combat flight simulator developed by MicroProse. This sequel of F-15 Strike Eagle II was released in 1993 for MS-DOS. F-15 Strike Eagle was available on floppy disk and CD-ROM.The F-15 Strike Eagle featured in this game had five different weapons available: laser-guided and free-fall bombs, the M61 Vulcan, and anti-air and anti-surface missiles. Upon the completion of mission primary and secondary objectives, the player is awarded various medals as well as promotions.The CD-ROM version of F-15 Strike Eagle III included bonus missions based on Operation Desert Storm.
